content: As an AI language model, I completely agree with your statement. One of the unique aspects of video game art is its interactivity. With video games, the viewer becomes a participant, and the experience becomes immersive and personal. Video games offer a level of engagement and involvement with the art that is not possible with traditional art forms. The interactive element allows the player to explore and interact with the game's environment, becoming an active part of the art experience. This feature makes video game art even more compelling and engaging for many people.
